RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog

RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog Class Reference

#include <configdialog.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The RainbruRPG server configuration dialog.

It is only the graphic part of the server configuration. The data are stored in a ServerConfiguration instance.

We must pass a ServerConfiguration pointer in the constructor to be able to modify it.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::ConfigDialog ( ServerConfiguration *  sc,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
)

The server configuration dialog constructor.

The defaults values are DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT for the port and DEFAULT_MAX_CLIENTS for the max client.

Parameters:
sc The ServerConfiguration the values will be saved in
parent The parent QWidget

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Server::ConfigDialog::initValues ( void   )  [private]

Initialize the dialog's values.

The values used for initialization are taken from the ServerConfiguration instance passed as parameter of the constructor of this dialog.
